full_summary:
Title
----------

*English Title: OSIRIS-REx Sample Curation Facility - Science Support*
*French Title: Établissement de conservation d’échantillon OSIRIS-REx – Support Scientifique*

Reference Number
----------------

*PW-22-01009457*

Tender Information
------------------

### Description of Work

This tender solicitation seeks consultants with expertise to provide technical services and support for one or more aspects of the OSIRIS-REx Sample Curation Facility.

### Duration of the Contract

The project duration is expected to be From contract award date to March 31, 2025

Tender Location
----------------

The contract will be awarded to a consultant based in Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region), Canada.

### Procurement Details

*Notice Type:* Request for Proposal
*Solicitation Number:* 9F012-22-0151
*Publication Date:* October 6, 2022
*Tender Closing Date:* October 24, 2022 2:00 PM ET

### Contact Details

*Contracting Entity:* Canadian Space Agency
*Contact Person:* Melanie Seguin
*Email:* [melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.seguin@asc-csa.gc.ca)
*Phone:* 438 364-1399

### Document Attachment

Documents related to this tender can be accessed at the following URLs:

*[Request for Proposal (*RFP*)][1]
*[Statement of Work (*SOW*)][2]*
*[Demande de Proposition [*DDP*]][3]*
*[Enoncé des Travaux (*EDT*)][4]*
